title: Font Aid IV book available through Lulu
content:
Alison Eickhoff, with the help of Chank Diesel, created a beautiful 52-page book containing the Font Aid IV submissions. The book is now available through Lulu.com:

[http://www.lulu.com/product/paperback/coming-together-font-aid-iv/6553234](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019042307/http:/www.lulu.com/product/paperback/coming-together-font-aid-iv/6553234 "http://www.lulu.com/product/paperback/coming-together-font-aid-iv/6553234")

I ordered a copy last week and I'm really impressed with it. The cost is $25 and all profits will go to help victims of the Haiti earthquake.

Thanks everyone for your help and support!
author: MichellePerham

comments.content: Well done! Thanks to Chank, Michelle, and all those involved!
